description: city street; car and double-decker bus at right; small tree at center; four figures walking on sidewalk at left; signs on stores at left; stoplight to left of tree
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on back, in black pencil: [H17]; on back, in graphite pencil: [9008]
signed: on back, in black pencil: [LONDON / FROM 84 CHARING CROSS ROAD / ca 1937. / W. Suschitzky.]
title: View from 84 Charing Cross Road towards Cambridge Circus [stop light]
